1.14.4.1.1.7-b2:
[A] Entity detectors have configurable pulse time.
[M] Industrial bistable switch model changes ported from 1.12.
1.14.4.1.1.6-b1:
[A] Color tint support of gauges, glass switches, and sensitive glass ported.
[M] Block detector switch patterns support tags.
1.14.4.1.1.5-b1: [A] Initial 1.12.2 to 1.14.4 port of all features except color tinting and Forge ore dictionary dependent blocks.
